---
title: PoPS_FLOW
---

PoPS integrates MAGMA outputs with feature matrices to prioritise genes.

Key responsibilities

- Run PoPS scoring using provided feature files and MAGMA results.

Important parameters

- `run_pops`, `pops_script`, `pops_features_all`.

Notes

- PoPS typically requires MAGMA outputs and benefits from loci grouping for best performance.
